# allowsDocumentSharing

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the document is shareable from the standard Share menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsDocumentSharing: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the owning document controller enables share options for this document. When the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the document controller disables the Share menu when this document is selected.

## Sharing the Document

- **prepare(_:)**: Perform any custom setup associated with a sharing service picker.
- **share(with:completionHandler:)**: Share the document’s file using the specified sharing service.
